name: recommendarr
description: Recommendarr is a self-hosted tool that recommends movies and shows from your media library based on ratings and usage. It integrates with Plex, Radarr, and Sonarr.
features: Smart recommendations: Suggest movies and shows based on viewing history and ratings from your Plex library.
Plex integration: Analyze watch history and user ratings to understand preferences and patterns.
Radarr/Sonarr sync: Automatically add recommended content to your download queue for acquisition.
Collaborative filtering: Generate suggestions based on what similar users enjoyed in their libraries.
Trending content: Discover popular movies and shows that match your taste preferences.
Watchlist management: Save recommendations for later and track which suggestions you've already seen.
Rating analysis: Use IMDb, TMDb, and Trakt ratings to filter and rank recommendations.
Genre preferences: Fine-tune suggestions by specifying favorite genres or excluding unwanted categories.
User profiles: Create separate recommendation profiles for different family members or viewing moods.
Discovery dashboard: Browse recommended content with posters, descriptions, and rating information.
Notification system: Get alerts when highly-rated content matching your preferences becomes available.
API access: Build custom integrations or automate recommendation workflows using REST endpoints.
